bcbioRNASeq 0.2.7

Sample Data

Source: R/sampleData-methods.R
sampleData.Rd

Return the sample metadata. Columns are always sanitized to factor.

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq
sampleData(object, interestingGroups,
  clean = FALSE)

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq,DataFrame
sampleData(object) <- value

Arguments

object

Object.
interestingGroups

character. Groups of interest that define the samples. If left unset, defaults to sampleName.
clean

boolean. Only return factor columns not defined in bcbioBase::metadataBlacklist.
value

Value to assign.

Value

DataFrame.

Note

This is a complement to the standard colData() function, but improves support for accessing sample metadata for datasets where multiple items in the columns map to a single sample (e.g. cells for a single-cell RNA-seq experiment).

See also

bcbioBase::metadataBlacklist.

Other Data Functions: aggregateReplicates, counts, metrics, tmm, tpm

Examples

# SummarizedExperiment ====
sampleData(bcb_small, clean = TRUE) %>% glimpse()
#> Formal class 'DataFrame' [package "S4Vectors"] with 6 slots
#>   ..@ rownames       : chr [1:6] "control_rep1" "control_rep2" "control_rep3" "fa_day7_rep1" ...
#>   ..@ nrows          : int 6
#>   ..@ listData       :List of 6
#>   .. ..$ sampleName: Factor w/ 6 levels "control_rep1",..: 1 2 3 4 5 6
#>   .. ..$ day       : Factor w/ 2 levels "0","7": 1 1 1 2 2 2
#>   .. ..$ replicate : Factor w/ 3 levels "1","2","3": 1 2 3 1 2 3
#>   .. ..$ strain    : Factor w/ 1 level "Balb/c": 1 1 1 1 1 1
#>   .. ..$ tissue    : Factor w/ 1 level "kidney": 1 1 1 1 1 1
#>   .. ..$ treatment : Factor w/ 2 levels "control","folic_acid": 1 1 1 2 2 2
#>   ..@ elementType    : chr "ANY"
#>   ..@ elementMetadata: NULL
#>   ..@ metadata       : list()
sampleData(bcb_small, clean = FALSE) %>% glimpse()
#> Formal class 'DataFrame' [package "S4Vectors"] with 6 slots
#>   ..@ rownames       : chr [1:6] "control_rep1" "control_rep2" "control_rep3" "fa_day7_rep1" ...

#>   .. .. ..- attr(*, "names")= chr [1:6] "control_rep1" "control_rep2" "control_rep3" "fa_day7_rep1" ...
#>   ..@ elementType    : chr "ANY"
#>   ..@ elementMetadata: NULL
#>   ..@ metadata       : list()

# Assignment support
x <- bcb_small
sampleData(x)[["test"]] <- seq_len(ncol(x))
# `test` column should be now defined
"test" %in% colnames(sampleData(x))
#> [1] TRUE
